descriptionHtml:
This is the way I like her. I didn\'t make her for The Nexus. I made her for me. 

Nothing special. I hated the Rayya that Bethesda shacked us up with. So much so that I always sacrificed her to Boethia. So I thought I\'d share. People say sharing is caring.

This mod changes her appearance and voice only.

-She\'s wearing Serana\'s outfit, red makeup.
-Removed her Scimitars and replaced it with an Ebony Sword.
-She is a Nord now and gave her the \"young and eager\" female voice, and female movement.
(I use [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36286//?\"]Feminine Females[/url] by NemesisTheWarlock, but she should have female animations now anyway.

Named her Amy Lee. I love Amy Lee. I want to marry Amy Lee and have Amy Lee babies.
If you really hate that name I\'ll change it back to Rayya.

Requirements:
Dawnguard for Serana\'s outfit,
Hearthfire.

Installation:

Just drop the esp in your .../Skyrim/Data folder


============================================================================

Check out my other mods Â

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37229//?]Honeyside Facelift[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36751//?]Proudspire Makeover (W.I.P)[/url]
author: Noxide
